mean_en: connected with the scientific study of the normal functions of living things; connected with the way in which a particular living thing functions
sentence: The teacher is giving a lesson about physiological knowledge.
sentence_trans: 老师在上一堂关于生理知识的课。
word_etyma: physio生理 + logical形容词后缀: 学科的 → physiological生理的，生理学的
